inputs.remark:
缺少 V2，V3，V4。
V1：ABR 应移至 V2 - our center；CT Scan 应移至 V3 影像学检查。
Speech audiometry：应明确为初始评估数据 "RE: 92%, LE: 92%"。
V2：Speech audiometry (retest): LE dropped to 80%, RE 92%, no rollover at high intensity。
ABR: Left ear - Wave I clear (1.44 ms), subsequent waves abnormal/indistinguishable; Right ear - Wave V absent or markedly diminished, suggesting brainstem compression。
V3：CT Scan: Large mass lesion (4-5 cm) in the left CPA；Pathology report: Confirmed schwannoma。
V4：Post-surgical audiometry: Left ear - no measurable hearing remained；Right ear - thresholds stable。

logic_summary: Restructured expected_interpretations_by_visit to include V1, V2, V3, and V4.
V1: Updated Speech audiometry to initial values (92% bilaterally) and removed ABR/CT.
V2: Added Speech audiometry (retest) and moved ABR here with updated details.
V3: Moved CT Scan here and added Pathology report.

value.collective_interpretation: Initial evaluation showed normal pure tone thresholds bilaterally and excellent speech recognition (92% bilaterally). However, contralateral acoustic reflexes were absent with left ear stimulation, raising suspicion of retrocochlear pathology.

tests.name: Pure-tone audiometry
tests.result_summary: Essentially normal pure tone thresholds bilaterally (0-20 dB HL).

tests.name: Acoustic reflexes
tests.result_summary: Contralateral reflexes absent with left ear stimulation; normal with right ear stimulation.

value.collective_interpretation: Follow-up testing at our center showed a decline in left ear speech recognition. ABR results were grossly abnormal on the left and indicated brainstem compression on the right.

tests.name: Speech audiometry (retest)
tests.result_summary: LE dropped to 80%, RE 92%, no rollover at high intensity

tests.name: Auditory Brainstem Response (ABR)
tests.result_summary: Left ear - Wave I clear (1.44 ms), subsequent waves abnormal/indistinguishable; Right ear - Wave V absent or markedly diminished, suggesting brainstem compression

value.collective_interpretation: Imaging and pathology confirmed the diagnosis.

tests.name: CT Scan
tests.result_summary: Large mass lesion (4-5 cm) in the left CPA

value.collective_interpretation: Post-surgical status showed total hearing loss in the affected ear.

tests.name: Post-surgical audiometry
tests.result_summary: Left ear - no measurable hearing remained; Right ear - thresholds stable
